prompt: A lo-fi hip hop beat with a mellow electric piano playing smooth jazzy chords over a laid-back boom-bap drum pattern. A deep sub bass hums beneath the groove. The mix is clean and modern with minimal noise artifacts, evoking a relaxed late-night study session. Instrumental, no vocals.
